pr_title: [RW-5575][risk=no] add a list of criteria to the DataSet client object

timeline.bodyText: Is there a ticket to move this to mapper?
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: My plan is to eventually do away with this ConceptService once we migrate everything over to cohort builder search. We have a ticket to remove it here: https://precisionmedicineinitiative.atlassian.net/browse/RW-5600
replies.author: freemabd

replies.bodyText: When migrated to CB search we should only be returning Criteria objects and will no longer need the Concept object
replies.author: freemabd
